name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box, soldier arms and legs, and a classic screen, RetroBot brings a nostalgic vibe to the modern world. Equipped with its trusty retro console buttons and stylish glasses addon, RetroBot is always ready for any digital adventure. Its ability_scores range from 0 to 10 in hp, charisma, constitution, dexterity, intelligence, strength, and wisdom. RetroBot's skills and alignment reflect its dedication to exploring the digital realm and helping others along the way.
